title: Process a Speaker Program Contract
description: A medical affairs coordinator needs to process a contract and payment for a physician who is speaking at a company-sponsored event.

tasks.description: Generate a speaker contract using an approved legal template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new contract populated with the speaker's details and the honorarium amount.

tasks.description: Send the contract to the physician for their electronic signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the contract via a secure e-signature platform.

tasks.description: Once the contract is executed, process the payment for the honorarium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits a payment request to the finance department.

tasks.description: Report the payment to comply with transparency regulations (e.g., the Sunshine Act).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the payment in the transparency reporting system.
